data.quote: Appear weak when you are strong, and strong when you are weak.
data.author: Sun Tzu

data.quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
data.author: Sun Tzu

data.quote: If you know the enemy and know yourself, you need not fear the result of a hundred battles.
data.author: Sun Tzu

data.quote: Let your plans be dark and impenetrable as night, and when you move, fall like a thunderbolt.
data.author: Sun Tzu

data.quote: In the midst of chaos, there is also opportunity.
data.author: Sun Tzu

data.quote: Supreme excellence consists of breaking the enemy's resistance without fighting.
data.author: Sun Tzu

data.quote: All warfare is based on deception.
data.author: Sun Tzu

data.quote: Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win.
data.author: Sun Tzu

data.quote: The greatest victory is that which requires no battle.
data.author: Sun Tzu

data.quote: If your enemy is secure at all points, be prepared for him. If he is in superior strength, evade him.
data.author: Sun Tzu
